title: Man, 11-Year-Old Daughter Dead In Apparent Murder-Suicide In Hardin County
content:
A man and his daughter were found dead in Hardin County in what police called an apparent murder-suicide Monday night.
Kentucky State Police say officers and firefighters responded to a report of multiple gunshot victims and found the bodies of John Jonas, 49, and his 11-year-old daughter lying in a side yard at a home along Willow Crossing Court in Vine Grove. Police say the investigation remains ongoing, but preliminary findings indicate it was a murder-suicide.
Officials say autopsies are scheduled for Tuesday morning.
